text:
Giovanni Battista Rabino (15 December 1931 – 12 March 2020) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Christian Democracy party. He served as an MP from 1983 to 1994. He was born in Montaldo Scarampi.
On 12 March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Rabino died due to COVID-19 in Asti. He was 88.
